review: Had a lot of apps but where missing some I was hoping for. The search was nice but would try to push Amazon content instead of showing you the free or cheapest way first. Had some performance/speed issues and had to restart the stick a few times after apps would not open or crash.
author: trevor burch

review: Super impressed with this so far! For the price--a steal! ... I just bought the game controller to play the free games included, and its priced as much as the device. Hahaa--still way ahead on savings compared to similar devices out there. The Fire TV has all my music integrated and is by far the best deal around! ... I wonder if my Echo can join in all the fun?  It's much better than my Chromecast was (gave it away after I bought this) and waaaay more versatile than my Apple TVs (I have two of them); I just wish it was as easy to maneuver around the menus as my Apple TV. The movie menus are linear as opposed to grid style.
